title: 95/275/EC: Commission Decision of 10 July 1995 amending Commission Decision 94/777/EC laying down special conditions for the import of live bivalve molluscs, echinoderms, tunicates and marine gastropods originating in Turkey
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 10 July 1995 amending Commission Decision 94/777/EC laying down special conditions for the import of live bivalve molluscs, echinoderms, tunicates and marine gastropods originating in Turkey (Text with EEA relevance) (95/275/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex C of Decision 94/777/EC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 July 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 312, 6. 12. 1994, p. 35.
ANNEX
'ANNEX C
>TABLE>
